name: X's & O's Football
description:
A MUST HAVE Game for iMessage, play College football Overtime rules right in iMessage!

A very unique twist on football! Draw your own routes and plays! All players only move on their routes, creating a very one of a kind football experience, watching if your defenders will cross the same routes as the offense!

Play 3 ways:
•Singleplayer
•Live multiplayer through GameCenter with a friend
•Turn based through iMessage app at your leisure

**Also play by College Football Overtime rules! No clock, and each user gets the ball at the 25 yard line!

All time stats are saved to leaderboards for single player, view stats after each game and share the results.
